org.intellimate.izou.addon

Class AddOnManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intellimate.izou.util.IzouModule
      • org.intellimate.izou.addon.AddOnManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Identifiable, AddonThreadPoolUser, MainProvider

    public class AddOnManager
extends IzouModule
implements AddonThreadPoolUser
    Manages all the AddOns.

        Returns:

      • getPluginWrapper

        public Optional<ro.fortsoft.pf4j.PluginWrapper> getPluginWrapper(AddOnModel addOnModel)
        returns the (optional) PluginWrapper for the AddonModel. If the return is empty, it means that the AddOn was not loaded through pf4j
        Parameters:
        addOnModel - the AddOnModel
        Returns:
        the PluginWrapper if loaded through pf4j or empty if added as an argument

      • loadedThroughPF4J

        public boolean loadedThroughPF4J(AddOnModel addOnModel)
        checks whether the AddOn was loaded through pf4j
        Parameters:
        addOnModel - the AddOnModel to check
        Returns:
        true if loaded, false if not

      • addAspectOrAffected

        public void addAspectOrAffected(ro.fortsoft.pf4j.AspectOrAffected aspectOrAffected)
        adds an aspect-class url to the list. Must be done before loading of the addons!
        Parameters:
        aspectOrAffected - the aspect or affected to add

      • addInitializedListener

        public void addInitializedListener(Runnable runnable)
        adds an listener to the initialized state (all addons registered).
        Parameters:
        runnable - the runnable to add
